name: The Kevin Rose Show Podcast
seeking: The Kevin Rose Show targets tech entrepreneurs and personal finance seekers, meaning they seek JV partners who offer technology tools, investment platforms, or business growth courses that can be promoted to their tech-savvy audience as sponsors or affiliates. They would also benefit from co-promotion with other top tech entrepreneur or personal finance podcasts. Sponsorship or affiliate deals with fintech, SaaS, or online business education companies would be the most direct JV fit.
who_you_serve: Tech entrepreneurs, business professionals, and personal finance seekers interested in technology and business insights.
what_you_do: Share business insights and personal finance wisdom through podcast featuring entrepreneurs and investors.
offering: Podcast episodes featuring interviews with entrepreneurs and investors on technology, business, and personal finance topics
business_focus: Share business insights and personal finance wisdom through podcast featuring entrepreneurs and investors.
